section.heading: Establishment of the Criminal Justice Coordinating Council.
section.text: There is established as an independent agency within the District of Columbia government the Criminal Justice Coordinating Council.

annotations.annotation: For temporary (90 day) addition of section, see § 1403 of Fiscal Year 2002 Budget Support Emergency Act of 2001 (D.C. Act 14-124, August 3, 2001, 48 DCR 7861).
